meanings.definition: The process of granting citizenship to a foreigner.
meanings.sent1: The naturalizations of immigrants can take several years to complete.
meanings.sent2: The government announced new laws to streamline the naturalizations of refugees.
meanings.sent3: The naturalizations of aliens were celebrated with a big parade in the city.
meanings.sent4: The naturalizations of newcomers into our society enrich our cultural tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The long-awaited naturalizations of the asylum seekers finally came through.

meanings.definition: The act of adapting to a new environment or culture.
meanings.sent1: Her naturalizations to the bustling city life were challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: The naturalizations of the exchange student were evident in how well she spoke the local language.
meanings.sent3: His naturalizations to the quirky office culture included wearing mismatched socks every Friday.
meanings.sent4: The naturalizations of the family to the rural lifestyle transformed their perspective on nature.
meanings.sent5: The naturalizations of the team to the new project management system were seamless and efficient.
